basics.name: Aakash Ram Chandran
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Machine Learning Engineer specializing in computer vision, deep learning, and embedded systems. I have successfully deployed advanced ML solutions in production environments and thrive on solving real-world challenges with innovative approaches.

work.name: Bahead GmbH
work.summary: Work on developing, deploying, and optimizing machine learning models for various robotics applications.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
